homeHeader.title: Business Setup In Ras Al Khaimah Free Zone — Seamless Solutions for Every Entrepreneur & Enterprise
homeHeader.description: Finding the right location, accessing global markets, and ensuring long-term stability are big questions for any entrepreneur. Look no further because One Nexuz takes the complexity out of establishing your company in the RAK lucrative Free Zone, with solutions designed around your goals. With zero corporate taxes and full capital repatriation, the region empowers you to maximise your profits. Get expert help to streamline business setup in RAK.

leftSection_1.title: Why Join the Thousands Registering in the RAK Free Zone?
leftSection_1.description: With cost-effective business setup solutions and fast-growing markets, it’s no surprise that the region attracts startups worldwide.

items.title: From Partial Ownership to 100% Control of Your Business
items.subTitle: From Partial Ownership to 100% Control of Your Business
items.description: Worried about losing control or sharing profits with local sponsors? RAK Free Zone eliminates this concern by offering complete foreign ownership. Business owners enjoy full strategic autonomy and decision-making power while retaining 100% of their profits.

items.title: Cut Costs, Protect Profits, and Enjoy Unmatched Tax Incentives
items.subTitle: Cut Costs, Protect Profits, and Enjoy Unmatched Tax Incentives
items.description: Taxes can limit business growth, but RAK Free Zone offers 0% corporate and personal income tax along with 100% profit repatriation. This tax-free structure ensures businesses maximize earnings, safeguard margins, and reinvest savings directly into expansion.

items.title: Benefit from Low Entry Costs, Scale Strategically, & Expand Faster
items.subTitle: Benefit from Low Entry Costs, Scale Strategically, & Expand Faster
items.description: Launching a business doesn’t need to drain resources. Known for some of the UAE’s lowest setup and operating costs, RAK Free Zone makes company formation accessible to startups and cost-conscious investors while providing a scalable environment for long-term growth.

items.title: From Regional Market to Global Expansion, Driving Revenue Across Borders
items.subTitle: From Regional Market to Global Expansion, Driving Revenue Across Borders
items.description: RAK Free Zone’s strategic location near major seaports and transport networks positions businesses at the heart of international trade. With seamless logistics and cross-border access, companies gain a competitive edge to expand beyond the UAE and reach global markets efficiently.

leftSection_3.title: Choose the Right Legal Structure in RAK Free Zones with One Nexuz
leftSection_3.description: Whether you’re launching as a solo founder or building a multi-shareholder company, RAK offers business structures that match your unique goals.

items.title: Free Zone Establishment
items.description: Well-suited for solo founders, an FZA provides entrepreneurs 100% ownership and quick setup with a unique single shareholder structure.

items.title: Free Zone Company
items.description: Designed for businesses with 2 or more shareholders, an FZC offers unparalleled scalability and access to complex activity combinations.

items.title: Branch of a Foreign Company
items.description: Ideal for multinational brands seeking expansion, this allows you to open a subsidiary with the parent entity intact and operating locally.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What documents do I need to start a company in the RAK free zone?
items.answer: You’ll need a copy of your passport, proposed business names, passport-sized photos, and completed application forms.

items.question: Can I set up remotely in the Ras Al Khaimah Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, the RAK free zone allows businesses to register remotely. However, you’ll have to visit the UAE for biometric scans when applying for a visa.

items.question: How long does it take to register a company in the RAK Free Zone?
items.answer: It generally takes 2 to 5 working days to get your RAK free zone license. However, our experts at One Nexuz help you get issued in 24-48 hours.

items.question: How many visas can I apply for using a RAK Free Zone license?
items.answer: You can apply for 2 to 6 visas, depending on your business license, selected activities, and office packages.

items.question: Can I open a corporate bank account with a RAK Free Zone license?
items.answer: Yes! You can open your bank account using an RAK free zone license. Our experts help simplify this step by handling all the compliances and documentation.
